Movie.Name: Avengers: Endgame
Movie.Content: The Avengers must assemble once more in order to undo Thanos' actions and restore order to the universe.

Movie.Name: Fast And Furious X
Movie.Content: Dom Toretto and his family are targeted by the vengeful son of drug lord Hernan Reyes.

Movie.Name: The Flash: Movie
Movie.Content: This summer, the multi-worlds will collide fiercely with the steps of FLASH

Movie.Name: Spider Man Across The Spider Verse
Movie.Content: Miles Morales reappears in the sequel to the Oscar-winning animated blockbuster - Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse. After meeting Gwen Stacy again, the friendly Spider-Man from Brooklyn must travel through the multiverse and meet a group of Spider-Man charged with protecting parallel universes. But when the group of superheroes clash over how to handle a new threat, Miles is forced to pit himself against other Spider-Mans and must redefine what it means to be a hero so he can save the people he loves.dearest.
